meanings.definition: To remove the thymus gland surgically.
meanings.sent1: The doctors thymectomized the patient to treat their condition.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon thymectomized the thymus gland successfully.
meanings.sent3: After being thymectomized, the patient joked about feeling lighter without their thymus.
meanings.sent4: The removal of the thymus gland thymectomized the body's immune system, like taking out a key piece of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The thymus gland was thymectomized from the patient's body, leaving a noticeable change in their health.

meanings.definition: Having undergone a surgical removal of the thymus gland.
meanings.sent1: The thymectomized patient followed a special diet post-surgery.
meanings.sent2: She felt different after becoming thymectomized.
meanings.sent3: The thymectomized individual proudly showed off their scar from the surgery.
meanings.sent4: The thymectomized cat seemed to have more energy after the procedure.
meanings.sent5: The thymectomized child's immune system had to adapt to the change in their body.
